title: RBI imposes penalty on City Union Bank, Tamilnad Mercantile Bank and 2 others for THIS reason
description:
RBI imposes penalty on City Union Bank, Tamilnad Mercantile Bank and 2 others for THIS reason The RBI has imposed monetary penalty on City Union Bank, Tamilnad Mercantile Bank and two other lenders for contravention of certain directions issued by the central bank.

New Delhi:
